text: Approval for the prostar(r) percutaneous vascular surgical (pvs) system.  The prostar(r) pvs system consists of the prostar(r) pvs device (9 and 11 french sizes) and the following accessories: a prostar(r) pre-dilator (9 and 11 french sizes), a perclose(r) knot pusher, and prostar(r) transition guidewire, and a perclose(r) arterial tamper.  The prostar(r) pvs system is indicated for the percutaneous delivery of sutures for closing the common femoral artery access site anc reducing the time to hemostasis and ambulation (time-to-standing) of patients who have undergone interventional procedures using 8 to 11 french sheaths
